prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Bass, Drums, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1: This composition features Guitar, Bass, and Drums, but no Piano.

Style 2: This piece is comprised of Guitar, Bass, and Drums, but Piano is absent.

Style 3: This song has Guitar, Bass, and Drums, Piano not included.
